display_long_description:
**Your next gen plank walking simulator**, set high up in New York City, designed to maximize the Quest hardware, at the introductory price of just $5.99 (USD). It's the perfect experience to show off your new headset!
[media]
# The Ultimate Welcome To VR
Bring friends and family together for great laughs as everyone’s knees go weak on a thin plank atop the One Astor Plaza skyscraper!
[media]
# Next Gen Realism
We set out to push the limits of what the most realistic plank simulator could be on next gen Quest hardware.
[media]
# Plank Variety
6 plank variations including: Wood Plank, Glass Plank, Metal Grate, The Pole, Red Light Green Light and Roulette. More to come!
[media]
# Two Environments Included and Counting!
[media]
# Health and Safety Warning
All users must refer to the in-game EULA and Safety Guidelines to limit the risk of injury or harm when walking the virtual plank.

**Your next gen plank walking simulator**, set high up in New York City, designed to maximize the Quest hardware, at the introductory price of just $5.99 (USD). It's the perfect experience to show off your new headset!

# The Ultimate Welcome To VR
Bring friends and family together for great laughs as everyone’s knees go weak on a thin plank atop the One Astor Plaza skyscraper!
![{"height":420,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75300188_1355526652351506_2178293079657922896_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=fwyqOBsG6fEQ7kNvwEFN-fF&_nc_oc=Adkkykw1X4NpzWbYWY6TzZLWk8Va9kc-Nm0Q9tv5oV3WJmhmIhbJ8N1kEBtMOt0uN-8&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=JWyoE46g74vST1wu6ei0dg&oh=00_AfPYg-sk32bfIFSebQDsJ2igJO0C79ChLQXmQ4NNn_PVjQ&oe=684DC364)
# Next Gen Realism
We set out to push the limits of what the most realistic plank simulator could be on next gen Quest hardware.
![{"height":420,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031656_569899209002816_7347204436020726564_n.mp4?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=uvTOXOm7bbEQ7kNvwGwoHQp&_nc_oc=AdldHvRSNkbOUUU4np4KKCFwbKgcMysrw1wDtwg-lkjNRTtQvBGCvkJsLw-cpuoqVgw&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=JWyoE46g74vST1wu6ei0dg&oh=00_AfPJ4Cn3U6B_PEUXsH77UlDzDJnk9v_Zfu9GwDljtJwkKQ&oe=684DE2B2)
# Plank Variety
6 plank variations including: Wood Plank, Glass Plank, Metal Grate, The Pole, Red Light Green Light and Roulette. More to come!
